text: Need Quinn Richardson for Guzman y Gomez campaign. Budget around $2,356, looking for 2 x 30-second Instagram reel, 3 x Media interview, 2 x Twitter post, 2 x Pinterest pin, 1 x Product launch event. 3 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs December 2025. Usage rights for 12 months. Engagement period: 6 months.
